mapper.select:
SELECT d.CALA08,c.CBPB12,c.CBPB08,a.CBQB09,a.CBQB10,a.CBQA01,e.CBPK07, f.CBQA07,a.CBQB03,a.CBQA01,a.CBQB01 as cbqb01 from CBQB a LEFT JOIN CBPM b on b.CBPM01=a.CBQB08
LEFT JOIN CBPB c on c.CBPB01=b.CBPM08
LEFT JOIN CALA d on d.CALA01=c.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN CBPK e on e.CBPK01=b.CBPK01 LEFT JOIN CBQA f on f.CBQA01=a.CBQA01
WHERE a.CBQA01= #{cbqa01}
SELECT CBQA07,CBQA08,CBQA09,CBQA01 FROM CBQA ORDER BY CBQA08 DESC

SELECT CONCAT_WS ('-', b.CALA08, a.CBPB12,a.CBPB08,c.CBPM09) f from CBPB a LEFT JOIN CALA b ON a.CBPB10=b.CALA01 LEFT JOIN CBPM c on c.CBPM08=a.CBPB01 where a.CBPB06=0 and b.CALA08 like concat('%', #{cala08}, '%') or a.CBPB08 like concat('%', #{cbpb08}, '%') or a.CBPB12 like concat('%', #{cbpb12}, '%') or c.CBPM09 like concat('%', #{cbpm09}, '%') LIMIT 10
